author: sebor
msg: 2005-12-30  Martin Sebor  <sebor@roguewave.com>
STDCXX-89
* _algobase.h [!_RWSTD_NO_INLINE_MEMBER_TEMPLATES] (__rw_lt): Changed
from a template class with an ordinary member operator() to an ordinary
class with a template member operator() to permit the comparison of
arguments of heterogeneous types.

author: bnicholes
msg: Clean up and remove dead code

author: sebor
msg: 2005-12-30  Martin Sebor  <sebor@roguewave.com>
* 25.lower.bound.cpp (Y): Replaced derivation by containment to really
exercise STDCXX-89.

author: mrdon
msg: Implemented new Ruby on Rails-style controllers, minor fixes
* Added support for controller "classes"
* Instance level variables automatically added to response attributes
* Added a forward pattern definable on the Action mapping
* Default forwards that use the pattern to dynamically create an action forward
* Added ability to pass an "id" to the action method
* Upgraded to Struts 1.3 to use ActionMapping properties
* Adding default struts-config.xml in the jar so that simple applications
don't need to define one
* Added a "Flash" object to cleanly pass data from one action to another over
a redirect.  Again, borrowed from RoR
* Added a new "params" object, matching RoR, that supports processing of parameters
* Minor fixes to get test application running
